ocean.question: I am big and blue and full of water. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have waves!
⛵ Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am very slow.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.

ocean.question: I'm a fish that can be many colors and lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I'm a type of fish.
🌈 I'm known for my bright colors.
🏡 I live in a colorful neighborhood made of coral.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: ✋ I have many arms but no hands.
🐙 I can change my color.
🔎 I like to hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I'm very big, I sing songs and I have a blowhole on my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal that lives in the ocean
🎶 I make sounds that can be heard underwater.
💨 I have a hole on my back to breathe.

ocean.question: I look like a star and live on the bottom of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have pointy arms.
✨ I am not really a star, even though I look like one.
💪 I can grow back an arm if I lose it.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with many sharp teeth. Some people are scared of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I swim very fast
🦷 I have rows of teeth!
🌊 I am a predator in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am long and slithery and live in the ocean. Sometimes I hide in rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I look like a snake.
🕳️ I often hide in holes and caves.
⚡ I come in many colors and patterns.

ocean.question: I'm a giant squid that lives in the deep, dark ocean. I have big eyes!

hints.text: 🦑 I am very big.
🔦 I live where it is very dark.
👁️ I have the biggest eyes in the animal kingdom.

ocean.question: I’m a current in the ocean that carries warm water from one place to another. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am a river within the ocean.
☀️ I move warm water
🧭 I can affect the weather.

animal.question: I say 'Meow', I like milk, and I chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I love to drink from a saucer.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 Some people have me as a pet.

animal.question: I bark, wag my tail, and love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I love to play outside with a ball
🏡 I am often a part of the family

animal.question: I quack, swim in the water, and waddle when I walk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🐣 Baby ducks look up to me.
🏞️ I am often found in a pond or lake.

animal.question: I have a long trunk, big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🥜 I enjoy eating peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and strong.

animal.question: I am yellow, have a long neck, and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 My height helps me reach the tallest trees.
🌍 I live in Africa on the plains.
🟤 I have brown spots on my body.

animal.question: I roar loudly, have a mane, and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a symbol of courage and strength.
🍖 I am a carnivore and eat other animals.
🦁 I have a golden mane.

animal.question: I hop, have long ears, and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I eat carrots and other plants.
🐰 I am often associated with Easter.
🌱 I am a herbivore.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, and I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me blend in with my surroundings.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🐴 I am related to the horse.

animal.question: I swing from trees, eat bananas, and like to chatter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 My favorite food is yellow.
🐒 I live in the jungle in trees.
🗣️ I like to make noises and chatter.

animal.question: I hiss, slither, and some people are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
🥚 I come from an egg.
🌿 Some of us are very dangerous.
